doc.title: Crab Party: There's a party going on!
doc.text: I/PRP feel/VB incredulous/VB when/WRB I/PRP hear/VBD people/NNS talking/VBG about/IN the/DT price/NN of/IN crabs/NN ./. Take/VB for/IN example/NN the/DT situation/NN at/IN Yio/NNP Chu/NNP Kang/NNP Road/NNP ./. A/DT brief/JJ survey/NN of/IN the/DT prices/NN at/IN various/NN Crab/NNP Restaurants/NNP shows/NN that/IN the/DT average/NN price/NN of/IN crabs/NN is/VBZ around/IN $/$ 45/CD -/: $/$ 65/CD ./. But/CC even/RB this/DT does/VBZ not/RB take/VB into/IN account/JJ other/JJ hidden/JJ costs/VBZ like/IN peanuts/NNS ,/, towels/NN ,/, tea/NN as/IN well/RB as/IN the/DT cost/NN of/IN the/DT other/JJ items/NNS which/WRB you/PRP will/VB invariably/VB order/VB when/WRB you/PRP are/VBP eating/VBG crabs/NN ./. In/IN the/DT past/IN ,/, they/PRP used/VBD to/TO show/VB you/PRP the/DT scales/NN before/IN cooking/NN them/PRP ./. But/CC nowadays/RB ,/, most/NN restaurants/NN just/RB tell/VB you/PRP the/DT weight/NN of/IN the/DT crabs/NN after/IN you/PRP have/VBP eaten/VBN your/PRP$ meal/NN ./. It/PRP is/VBZ funny/JJ that/IN not/RB many/JJ of/IN us/PRP would/MD insist/VB on/IN seeing/VBG the/DT crabs/NN weighed/NN before/IN agreeing/NN on/IN the/DT price/NN ./. According/VBG to/TO one/CD Crab/NNP Supplier/. I/PRP spoke/VBD to/TO ,/, it/PRP is/VBZ industry/JJ practice/NN to/TO add/VB on/IN 100g/NN for/IN every/DT kg/NN crab/NN sold/VBD ./. I/PRP wo/VBP n't/RB be/VB surprised/VBD if/IN it/PRP was/VBD more/RB ./. So/CC the/DT restauranteurs/JJ need/NN to/TO make/VB up/RP for/IN the/DT loss/NN by/IN adding/VBG the/DT peanuts/NNS ,/, towels/NN and/CC earning/NN some/NN money/NN from/IN the/DT other/JJ dishes/NNS you/PRP order/VB ./. When/WRB comparing/VBG prices/NN of/IN Crabs/NNS at/IN various/NN restaurants/NN ,/, we/PRP need/VBP to/TO take/VB into/IN consideration/VBG all/PDT the/DT added/VBD stuff/NN and/CC not/RB just/RB look/VB at/IN the/DT price/NN tag/NN ./. The/DT only/RB thing/NN which/WRB I/PRP regret/VBD not/RB doing/VBG was/VBD to/TO weigh/VB them/PRP on/IN the/DT spot/NN ,/, something/NN I/PRP will/VB do/VB the/DT next/JJ time/NN ./. Weighing/JJ your/PRP$ Crabs/NNS on/IN the/DT spot/NN has/VBZ two/CD advantages/NNS ,/, one/CD is/VBZ that/IN you/PRP know/VBP how/RB much/RB you/PRP will/MD be/VB spending/NN on/IN the/DT crab/NN dish/NN and/CC secondly/NN ,/, you/PRP can/MD gauge/VB the/DT density/NN of/IN the/DT crab/NN ./. So/RB for/IN the/DT same/JJ sized/VBN crab/NN ,/, go/VB for/IN the/DT heavier/JJ one/CD ,/, which/WDT will/VB be/VB the/DT the/DT meatier/NN crab/NN ./. Sounds/DT so/RB logical/JJ and/CC straightforward/JJ right/NN ?/. I/PRP really/RB enjoyed/VBN the/DT white/JJ pepper/NN crabs/NN that/IN night/NN ./. They/PRP were/VBD Sri/RB Lanka/JJ crabs/NN -LRB-/IN you/PRP can/MD recognize/VB them/PRP by/IN the/DT pattern/NN and/CC color/NN of/IN the/DT claws/NN -RRB-/NN and/CC the/DT flesh/NN was/VBD sweet/JJ and/CC succulent/JJ ./.
